Home About Research Blog

Hi! I'm Idil, a recent master's graduate in Informatics (Computer Science) at Technical University of Munich (TUM). I previously obtained my bachelor's in Computer Engineering from Middle East Technical University (METU), Ankara. My interests broadly include computer vision and deep learning. Through my master's degree, I worked on self-supervised vehicle control at TUM Computer Vision Group under Prof. Daniel Cremers. I completed my master's thesis on zero-shot learning and 3D object part understanding at TUM CAMP Chair under PD Dr. Federico Tombari.

Email / GitHub / Twitter / Mastodon / LinkedIn / Scholar
